column1: Smoque BBQ////I'm not even sure why I'm going to make a yelp review for Smoque
column2: It has over 2500 reviews at this point
column4: its been in the papers.  You either love the food
column5: or you really like the food... OR you're a competitor giving a false review.  If you're on yelp and have been eating in Chicago for more than a few years and you have to look this place up because you don't know what it is
column6: maybe its time for you to stop being on yelp.
